title: Ep 253 | Dogs Give Phil Faith, BIG'N Steals from Willie & the Resurrection Is the Core of Everything
description:
Phil introduces his new dog, Drew, and explains why dogs are one reason he has faith in God. Jase's dog heads out for 20 minutes every day to steal from Willie. Jase Googles life after death without Jesus and gets some telling results. The guys talk about the centerpiece of the Gospel — the resurrection. And Jase makes the case that "life insurance" is a misnomer. Happy Resurrection Day, Unashamed Nation!
